trans-unit.source: The base exception type for all COM interop exceptions and structured exception handling (SEH) exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 所有 COM 互操作 异常和结构化异常处理 (SEH) 异常的异常基类型。

trans-unit.source: To enhance interoperability between legacy systems and the common language runtime, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property stores an integer value (HRESULT) that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: 若要增强旧系统和公共语言运行时之间的互操作性<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>属性存储一个整数值 (HRESULT)，标识错误。

trans-unit.source: User defined exceptions should never derive from `ExternalException`, and an `ExternalException` should never be thrown by user code.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的异常应永远不会派生自`ExternalException`，和`ExternalException`永远不应由用户代码引发。

trans-unit.source: Use the specific exceptions that derive from `ExternalException` instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用派生自的特定异常`ExternalException`相反。

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the HRESULT E_FAIL which has the value 0x80004005.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException` 使用具有值 0x80004005 HRESULT E_FAIL。

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException` 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial values for an instance of `ExternalException`, see the `ExternalException` constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关初始的实例值的列表`ExternalException`，请参阅`ExternalException`构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="ExternalException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="ExternalException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="ExternalException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see langword="ExternalException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 `ExternalException` 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: A localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定异常原因的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="ExternalException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see langword="ExternalException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 `ExternalException` 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="ExternalException" /> class from serialization data.
trans-unit.target: 从序列化数据初始化 <see langword="ExternalException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定异常原因的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="ExternalException" /> class with a specified error message and the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定错误信息和错误的 HRESULT 初始化 <see langword="ExternalException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 `ExternalException` 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="HRESULT" /> of the error.
trans-unit.target: 获取错误的 <see langword="HRESULT" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="HRESULT" /> of the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误的 <see langword="HRESULT" />。

trans-unit.source: See [Common HRESULT values](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx) for a list of the more frequently encountered error codes.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[常见的 HRESULT 值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx)越多的列表经常遇到的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: `HRESULT` values are defined in the Winerror.h header file.
trans-unit.target: `HRESULT` Winerror.h 标头文件中定义值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，该字符串包含错误的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 表示 HRESULT 的字符串。
